page.title: 16Crowthorne Leisure Survey
page.content: A number of clubs are available for children and adults. These include the clubs of the{Guide-Scout Association, {Boys and Girls Brigade, Red Cross, {St.John Ambulance, Football, Tennis, {Netball, Bowling, Women's Institute, {Gardening, Amateur Theatricals}and {Age Concern}for Senior Citizens. A survey of one hundred adults and children produced the following results. {Activity 16_65+yrs under16yrs {Watch sport } 56% {Play board games} 52% 63% {Watch videos } 46% 40% {Play sport} 42% 83% {Visit theatre} 40% 23% {Visit dances} 40% 58% {Play computer games}34% 50% {Make music } 18% 40% We found that those who made music were active in most other ways too.
